generated_description: culture publishers, legally known as culture entertainment inc., is a company based in tokyo, japan. the company specializes in the import, export, and distribution of copyrighted works, including films and music. it is involved in the planning, production, and distribution of video content, particularly focusing on asian and korean dramas. the company also operates the tsutaya creators’ program, a competition aimed at discovering and nurturing video creators.
